title:
A Priori Estimates for Singularities of the Lagrangian Mean Curvature
  Flow with Supercritical Phase
abstract:
In this paper, we prove interior a priori estimates for singularities of the
Lagrangian mean curvature flow assuming the Lagrangian phase is supercritical.
We prove a Jacobi inequality that holds good when the Lagrangian phase is
critical and supercritical. We further extend our results to a broader class of
Lagrangian mean curvature type equations.
